text.div: • Include codes from http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v3-EntityDeterminer where concept is-a GROUPKIND

name: EntityDeterminerDescribedGroup
title: EntityDeterminerDescribedGroup
description: A standard value set allowing reference to all EntityDeterminer codes that are equal to or specializations of GROUPKIND. This is the value set used when a model indicates that the binding is to "<= GROUPKIND".
